thread.section_title: Hotel Molitor Paris - MGallery Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great stay
thread.title_full: Great stay - Review of Hotel Molitor Paris - MGallery Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ariannap890
title: Great stay
text: The hotel is beautiful and has kept a lot of the look and feel of the past with high-end modern equipment. The pools and gym are very modern. Great place to relax and spend the weekend. We haven't been able to try out the restaurant which apparently is a must but the lounge for drinks and the breakfast were great.
